And <S%G2532><s%> Were Seeking <S%G2212><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> <S%G3588><s%> As To How <S%G4459><s%> They Might Put To Death <S%G337><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G5399><s%> For They Feared <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People. <S%G2992><s%>

<S%G1525><s%> And Entered <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Surnamed <S%G1941><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Number <S%G706><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve. <S%G1427><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Away <S%G565><s%> He Spoke With <S%G4814><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Captains <S%G4755><s%> <S%G3588><s%> As To How <S%G4459><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> He Might Deliver Up <S%G3860><s%> To Them. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> They Rejoiced, <S%G5463><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Agreed <S%G4934><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Money <S%G694><s%> To Give. <S%G1325><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Promised, <S%G1843><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sought <S%G2212><s%> Opportunity <S%G2120><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Deliver Up <S%G3860><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Away From The <S%G817><s%> Crowd. <S%G3793><s%>

<S%G2064><s%> And Came <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Unleavened Bread <S%G106><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Was Needful <S%G1163><s%> To Be Killed <S%G2380><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passover. <S%G3957><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> <S%G1525><s%> On Your Having Entered <S%G5216><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Will Meet <S%G4876><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> A Man, <S%G444><s%> A Pitcher <S%G2765><s%> Of Water <S%G5204><s%> Carrying; <S%G941><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> He Enters; <S%G1531><s%>

And He <S%G2548><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Will Shew <S%G1166><s%> Upper Room <S%G508><s%> A Large <S%G3173><s%> Furnished : <S%G4766><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Prepare. <S%G2090><s%>

<S%G565><s%> And Having Gone <S%G1161><s%> They Found <S%G2147><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> He Had Said <S%G2046><s%> To Them; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Prepared <S%G2090><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passover. <S%G3957><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Was Come <S%G1096><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> He Reclined At Table, <S%G377><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

No More) <S%G3765><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not At All <S%G3361><s%> Will I Eat <S%G5315><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> , It <S%G846><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G3755><s%> It Be Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> For I Say <S%G1063><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not At All <S%G3361><s%> Will I Drink <S%G4095><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fruit <S%G1081><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Vine <S%G288><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G3755><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Be Come. <S%G2064><s%>

In Like Manner <S%G5615><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cup <S%G4221><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Having Supped, <S%G1172><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Cup Is <S%G4221><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> New <S%G2537><s%> Covenant <S%G1242><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G129><s%> My Blood, <S%G3450><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Is Poured Out. <S%G1632><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And There Was <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> A Strife <S%G5379><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> This, <S%G3588><s%> Which <S%G5101><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> Is Thought <S%G1380><s%> To Be The <S%G1511><s%> Greater. <S%G3187><s%>

<S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Thus Shall Be; <S%G3779><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Greater <S%G3187><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Let Him Be <S%G1096><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Younger, <S%G3501><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Leads <S%G2233><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Serves. <S%G1247><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> For Which Is <S%G1063><s%> Greater, <S%G3187><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Reclines At Table <S%G345><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Serves? <S%G1247><s%> Is Not <S%G3780><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Reclines At Table? <S%G345><s%> <S%G1473><s%> But I 1161 CONJ Am 1510 V-PXI-1S In 1722 PREP The Midst 3319 A-DSN Of You 5216 P-2GP As 5613 ADV He That 3588 T-NSM Serves. 1247 V-PAP-NSM

That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Eat <S%G2068><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May Drink <S%G4095><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5132><s%> My Table <S%G3450><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G932><s%> My Kingdom, <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May Sit <S%G2523><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> Thrones, <S%G2362><s%> Judging <S%G2919><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Tribes <S%G5443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> Ready <S%G2092><s%> I Am <S%G1510><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Prison <S%G5438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> To Go. <S%G4198><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> For I Say <S%G1063><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Written <S%G1125><s%> Must <S%G1163><s%> Be Accomplished <S%G5055><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me, <S%G1698><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With The <S%G3326><s%> Lawless <S%G459><s%> He Was Reckoned : <S%G3049><s%> <S%G2532><s%> For Also <S%G1063><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> An End <S%G5056><s%> Have. <S%G2192><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Going Forth <S%G1831><s%> He Went <S%G4198><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Custom <S%G1485><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mount <S%G3735><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> <S%G190><s%> And Followed <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And Having Arrived <S%G1161><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G4336><s%> Pray <S%G3361><s%> Not To Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Temptation. <S%G3986><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Was Withdrawn <S%G645><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> About <S%G5616><s%> A Stone's <S%G3037><s%> Throw, <S%G1000><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And <S%G5087><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Falling On His Knees <S%G1119><s%> He Prayed, <S%G4336><s%>

<S%G3700><s%> And Appeared <S%G1161><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> An Angel <S%G32><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Strengthening <S%G1765><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>
